title: Print, "Pope Pius VI (1775-1799)", 1782
inscribed: printed in black ink, bottom margin: Francise (?) Piranesi inc: Romae. 1782
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Circular medallion portrait suspended from a bow knot.  A table shows the inscription: "PIVS SEXTVS / PONT. MAX." It is topped by a wind god and and flower boughs, and a garland hangs over it.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Pope Pius VI (1775-1799)", 1782.
1782. Etching on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-8455.
